      • waitForElementToBeClickable

        public static void waitForElementToBeClickable(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Waits for desired Seconds for the element to be Clickable.
        Sometimes an element/button is inactive/greyed out and can't be interacted with it. So, it waits for specified seconds and checks again if element is clickable or not.
        Parameters:
        element - the element

      • isElementPresent

        public static boolean isElementPresent(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                       org.openqa.selenium.By by)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if element is present on the current screen. Returns true/false if element is present/not present
        Parameters:
        driver - the WebDriver
        by - Pass the element as By.xpath / By.Id / By.Name or any other locator type supported with By
        Returns:
        True, if is elements present. False, if not present
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • isAttributeValuePresent

        public static boolean isAttributeValuePresent(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                              java.lang.String attribute)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if attribute value is present and not null. Ex: 'a' tag has attribute "href", so method will check if "href" attribute value is present or not
        Parameters:
        element - the element
        attribute - the attribute
        Returns:
        true, if attribute value is present else false for null/empty
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • selectDropdownItemBootStrap

        public static void selectDropdownItemBootStrap(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement dropdown,
                                               org.openqa.selenium.WebElement dropdownList,
                                               org.openqa.selenium.By commonLocatorWithinLiTagForAllItems,
                                               java.lang.String itemName)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Select dropdown item boot strap.
        Sometimes "select" tag is not used for drop-down menu. In such cases, this method assist's in selecting item from drop-down which is in the for of list("li") under "ul"/"ol" tags in view-source.
        Parameters:
        dropdown - the dropdown
        dropdownList - the dropdown list
        commonLocatorWithinLiTagForAllItems - the common locator within li tag for all items. Ex: By.className("active-result")
        itemName - the item name
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • selectDropdownItemBootStrap

        public static void selectDropdownItemBootStrap(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement dropdown,
                                               java.lang.String itemName)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                               java.awt.AWTException,
                                               java.lang.Exception
        Select dropdown item boot strap.
        Sometimes "select" tag is not used for drop-down menu. In such cases, this method assist's in selecting item from drop-down which is in the for of list("li") under "ul"/"ol" tags in view-source.
        Parameters:
        dropdown - the dropdown
        itemName - the item name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
        java.awt.AWTException - the AWT exception
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
